CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 1 Polymer solar cells (PSCs) |
| advanced donor and / or acceptor materials |

Explanation:

1. "Polymer solar cells (PSCs)" is a material name as it refers to a type of material used in the context of the paragraph.
2. "advanced donor and / or acceptor materials" is also a material name as it refers to the materials that are used in the development of polymer solar cells.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 1 Polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) with power conversion efficiency ( PCE ) exceeding 10% have been realized during the last decade , which was benefited from tremendous efforts on the development of advanced donor and / or acceptor materials , device engineering and optimized fabrication processes.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10% |
| advanced donor and / or acceptor materials |
| device engineering |
| optimized fabrication processes |

Explanation:

1. "10%" is a property value that represents the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells (PSCs).
2. "advanced donor and / or acceptor materials" is a property value that refers to the materials used in the development of PSCs.
3. "device engineering" is a property value that refers to the engineering of the PSCs.
4. "optimized fabrication processes" is a property value that refers to the processes used to fabricate PSCs.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 10% |

Explanation:

1. "10%" is the only valid entity that clearly refers to the "Value of material property" in the paragraph. It represents the power conversion efficiency (PCE) of polymer solar cells (PSCs).

The other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "advanced donor and / or acceptor materials", "device engineering", and "optimized fabrication processes" are not "Value of material property" entities. They are related to the development and fabrication of PSCs, but they do not have a clear numerical value associated with them.
